intent_atoms.description: Integrate Parser Event Pipeline with UI Components to auto-select the first parsed node so the detail pane populates as soon as streaming events arrive.
Default selection of the first parsed node is verified by ParseTreeOutlineViewModelTests and identifier tracking for updated snapshots.
The system must always maintain a consistent mapping between parser events and UI component selections.
Add macOS SwiftUI automation once available to cover end-to-end selection updates.

functional_units.name: Parser Event Pipeline Integration
functional_units.description: Integrates the parser event pipeline with UI components to automatically select and display parsed nodes in the detail pane.

functional_units.name: Default Selection Logic for Parsed Nodes
functional_units.description: Automatically selects the first parsed node so the detail pane populates immediately upon receiving streaming events.

functional_units.name: Identifier Tracking for Snapshot Updates
functional_units.description: Tracks identifiers of selected nodes across updated snapshots to maintain selection state.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeOutlineViewModel Tests
functional_units.description: Unit tests verifying default selection and identifier tracking behavior in the ParseTreeOutlineViewModel.
